alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Rusk; Smith (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 26 at 3:53AM CDT until April 26 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN SMITH...SOUTHWESTERN RUSK AND NORTHEASTERN CHEROKEE COUNTIES... At 352 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of New Salem, or 12 miles southwest of Henderson, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Henderson, Troup, Mount Selman, Ponta, Mixon, Turnertown, New Salem, Minden, New Summerfield, Mount Enterprise, Gallatin, Reklaw, Concord, Glenfawn, Brachfield, Church Hill and Laneville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
